ygData.subject: RE: Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I ll play: Head: Leatherfoot Skullcap (cha +10) Face: Silvered Star Ruby Vail (dex +5 cha +5) Ears: Golden Amber Earrings X2 (+3 Str) Neck: Bronze collar
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I'll play:

Head: Leatherfoot Skullcap (cha +10)
Face: Silvered Star Ruby Vail (dex +5 cha +5)
Ears: Golden Amber Earrings X2 (+3 Str)
Neck: Bronze collar (need to replace this)
Chest: Bronze Breastplate (although I should have the lambent any day now!)
Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle (as of tomorrow)
Arms: Lambent Vambraces
Wrist 1: Bracer of Erollisi (not patient enough for a feene charm)
Wrist 2: Lambent bracer
Hands: Lambent Gauntlets
Rings: Electrum star ruby X2 (dex +5 cha +7)
Back: splinted bronze cloak
Waist: Drakescale belt
Legs: Lambent Greaves
Feet: Lambent Boots

Weapons: Obsidian Scimitar, Dragoon dirk, Obsidian Shard (5 preds in a row!
finally got one), Silvery war axe. Right now I am using the dirk and the
shard and banking the other 2.

Instruments:
MM Battledrums (these ROCK!)
lute
Mino horn (I like the fixed graphic better than the flute)
Brass horn

flute in the bank

I really want the lambent helm, but I haven't got up the guts to see how
hard the DW gobs are and I'm really getting way to much XP, nice items and
pp in Sol A right now (have enough quest pieces for my 3rd pair of Lambent
boots and Lambent Vambraces. To bad they are lore. Going to be a happy
twinked bard in my guild soon :-) ).


Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 30th song
Prexus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michal Hobson [mailto:given@...]
> Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 9:08 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Equipment
>
>
> From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
>
> Wow, looks like I need to go shopping!
>
> I'll post this, perhaps somewhere some level 1 bard will think I'm the man
> hehe!
>
> Head: Bronze Helm
> Face: Leering Mask
> Ears: Golden Amber Earrings X2
> Neck: Spiked Collar
> Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
> Arms: Bronze Vambraces
> Wrist 1: Bracer of Erollisi
> Wrist 2: Bronze Bracer
> Hands: Lambent Gauntlets (I still keep my elf-hide in reserve though)
> Rings: Jagged Band, Can't remember the other, some wedding band
> or something
> +2 STR maybe?
> Back: Banded Cloak (Hehe)
> Waist: Drakescale Belt
> Legs: Lambent Greaves
> Feet: Kobold Hide Boots
>
> Weapons: Obsidian Scimitar X2, Dragoon Dirk, and my newly dusted off
> Obsidian Shard - thanks for the info by the way, who knew? A fire proc
> resisted by fire goblins? Sometimes I truly think I'm the slowest bard in
> Norrath.
>
> Instruments: Hand drum, lute, wodden flute, brass horn. I live
> dangerously!
>
> Money? Not a clue, not very much anymore after buying my lambent jewels.
>
> So there, I'll have you all know that I think the half smurf-half carrot
> look is going to be very in this season! At least you guys give us all
> something of a wish list to shoot for!
>
> Weiland
> <Disciples of Truth>
> Erollisi Marr
>
> Elwyn - If you feel inclined, throw your list up here. I'm curious, but
> still too timid in game to ask to inspect hehe. See you round!
>
>
